ygData.subject: Re: One hand or two?
ygData.msgSnippet: Matt- I have a 30th level barbarian warrior on Veeshan. I can only tell you what I ve chosen Max out 1hs, 2hs, taunt, kick, slam/bash  and I am working on
ygData.messageBody:
Matt-

I have a 30th level barbarian warrior on Veeshan. I can only tell you
what I've chosen
Max out 1hs, 2hs, taunt, kick, slam/bash and I am working on archery
(this has helped me take down runners).

Some have said take up piercing. When you get duel attack and duel weild
only for the fact that a piercing weapon is faster and will help max
these skills out.

I find that 1hs with duel weild is more effective in certain
circumstances and then 2hs in another. 1hs gives you speed of attack.
2hs is good for greatest impact (recently got a crit hit of 100.. now
that was sweet). If you use a 2hs or 1hs will also depend on your group
make up. I do carry all my weapons with me so at times will switch
depending on the circumstance.

All my reading and such have said to keep both maxed out. Some reasons
are the performance of the weapon others for the variety of weapons you
can use. I didn't work on my 2hs until I was at the 28th level and it
was very painful to max it out.

Good luck!

Az

Matthew Horne wrote:

> G'day my name is Kalroth.. a level 7 dwarf warrior on the solusek ro
> serverMy question is whether one hand or two hand slash is better for
> a warrior Hope you can help me , thanks
